name: e2b
title: E2B Code Interpreter
description: E2B is a tool that allows you to execute code in a secure sandbox withing a Jupyter-like notebook cell and return result
author: mlejva

commands.name: run-code
commands.title: Run Code
commands.description: Execute code in a Jupyter notebook cell and return result

tools.name: run-code
tools.title: Run Code
tools.description: Allow AI to execute code in a Jupyter notebook cell and return result

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
